Body:
I have a question for a machine translation exam which reads;

"Provide examples where unigram, brigram, trigram and 4-gram models would fail to capture a grammatical constraint of the English language."

Can anybody give examples of what grammatical constraints are as I don't have a clue...
Title: Grammatical constraint of language

LastEditedUser.AboutMe:
Travelling armchair linguist.

Never studied in an institution but read books and web with probably more breadth than depth.

Always on the road surviving in a strange foreign language, currently Mongolian and Mandarin Chinese.

And I collect dictionaries.
